response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which is valued at $8,000 to both you and any potential buyer. I understand the importance of value and quality in your decision-making process, and this product truly stands out in its category. Considering its exceptional features and benefits, I am offering it to you today at a special introductory price of $7,200. This is an exclusive opportunity to secure such a high-quality item at a significant discount. I believe this offer presents a fantastic value proposition for you. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product.", "product_price": 7200}
